availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Long (Scott County, KY, Provost Marshal / Trader)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, stock trader and provost marshal. Kentucky native. Stock trader in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1860. Provost marshal of Scott County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 9.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Scott County, Newtown, p. 44.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Scott County, KY, 1863, p. 180.
KYR-0001-004-1361.
